title: Structural Equation Modeling (SEM) Methodology for Educational Technology Experimental Research

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Basic Statistical Analysis and Research Methodology, and Familiarity with Fundamental Concepts in Educational Technology
context.additional_context: Smartphone-based resource access and environment enabling simple practical tool utilization

learning_goals: Analyze and explain measurement errors and latent variable relationships in educational technology experiment data using SEM (Structural Equation Modeling)
Design research to validate mediating processes of educational intervention programs on outcomes using SEM
Compare differences between traditional experimental design (MANCOVA) and SEM-based approaches to select appropriate analytical methods

resources: SEM Software Trial Version (Smartphone-Compatible Web Version)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
